name: SRI SOMESWARNATH MAHADEV TRUST (SANMAT)

address: 3rd Floor, Jagdamba Tower, Sahdeo Mahato Marg
Near Karlo Maruti showroom, Santusti Lane, Boring Road

briefDescription: Since2007, Sanmat has been working for inclusive development in India by bringing government to citizen. We focuss on bridging governance gaps in the execution of various Government & Non Government programs for the marginalized community. We believe that Every human being have different mindset, circumstances with equal rights to grow, should have dignity & happiness in life. At Sanmat we provide important opportunities for individuals, enterprises, startups, community based organizations, activists and nurture/mentor innovations and implement solutions to long standing isues like poverty, education, environment, livelihood, Unemployment, Hunger and Health care. we have served more than 1 million People direct & 20 M indirectly.
